tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  GET READY TO READ  CARING
comments: I am not a STATs pro, but enjoyed the class and got a good grade by doing what was assigned. Don\'t lay back and you will be happy you took this professor. Everything is straight forward. No surprises. Will take again.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Overall, not a super hard class if you take the time to read the chapters and try to understand the material. Assigns homework and Reading Assignments (easy). Comparing to homework, test are much easier. However, time limit was an issue for me on some exams. All in all, if you are okay learning this material on your own, then take this class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: The online class is tough but clear from the start. You\'re essentially on your own with the Connect program and material. Use the book, it\'s open notes tests and fairly straightforward. The homeworks are essential to getting a good grade, and probably more involved than the actual exams, as the exams are multiple choice. Not much help from the Prof

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: One of the hardest classes I have taken at CSUS. I was confused to TEARS the majority of the time (and so were most people!). His expectations are unclear. Lectures are fast, scattered, nonsensical, and borderline frightening! Make sure you stop him and ASK if you are unsure about ANY of the material. Group project highly influences grade!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Honestly... the class is fruitless. Teacher is of no help. Use a 2nd computer and google those questions for answers. Browser is not locked down and your tutor can be the world wide web. He\'s not helpful and lacks any real teaching skill. He lets mcgraw test you and teach you. Only online class Ive taken where a teacher can have near zero skillset.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: No contact class. Orientation optional. Follows syllabus exactly. Don\'t take the online class if you don\'t have intermediate math understanding. Weekly homework assignments, all exams online. You either understand the material or you don\'t.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Awful class. Online format really isn\'t that bad but the CONNECT system has so many issues. I read back 2 homework questions and petitioned for credit. Professor Alvayey did not respond. Went to office hours as one of the midterm questions was incorrect. He did a web search in front of me and explained it CONTRARY to the book. Avoid. Barely passed.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: AWFUL. I sent 5 e-mails and 2 phone calls and never received a reply. I tried his office hour and he said that the chapter "was so easy I should see it". The online format isn\'t too bad as Ive done online before. But CONNECT has issues and grades things incorrectly. Professor is strict on how THEY grade. Can\'t say enough how awful it was.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Took his online class, and regretted it. He is not a bad professor, and is reasonable with grades, but I found his class to be rife with problems that negatively impact the student.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Took this class online. Practice problems given weekly (highly recommended), homework due weekly every week. 2 exams and 1 cumulative final. Exams weighted and can drop one. Everything done on the website and professor requires small project at end of semester. Communication with prof is not the best.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This class was a breeze! the professor doesn\'t teach it\'s the Connect and Aleks systems that do the teaching but it\'s easy. He allows 2 tries for quizzes and midterm and takes the higher of the 2. Easy points for using Aleks and gives 3% extra credit. I never really used the book except on exams and got a B in the class without really trying.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Don\'t take this instructor, hard class, horrible instructor. Take Sun Yang instead, got easy A in his class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS! Terrible teacher, way too many websites to check, hard material to learn on your own. Please save yourself the stress and get another teacher!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This class is honestly not that difficult.The teacher lets the online sites (ALEKS, CONNECT, and SAC CT) teach you. Its confusing at first to have so many different sites, but it\'s not that hard. I spend 2 hours at the most during the week on this class. The site ALEKS teaches pretty clearly, just keep up with the work and you will do fine!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: How is this guy "teaching" at this school? Someone else can do a much better job than he can. All he does is require you to use two different online tools for class and then for his lectures he posts .pdf files from the book. Extremely useless teacher for a difficult subject.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: The online class is VERY difficult! I am a math nerd and find this class very frustrating. It has a very poor layout of online learning; there are 4 different websites that need to be checked a lof. HW, tests, quizzes, online book summaries and SacCT each has its own website. VERY FRUSTRATING- all is on different material. I do NOT reccomend!!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Do not take this teacher. I was surprised at everyone I talked to who said DS101 was a pretty easy class. It\'s probably the hardest class I\'ve ever taken because I had to teach everything to myself and I didn\'t understand anything. The only reason I managed to pass was because he lets you retake tests w/ the same exact questions. He\'s a moron.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This is a very hard class, and I think it has more to do with the online nature rather than the prof. The homework took several hours per day, but you need to do it in order to maintain a high grade. I would NOT recommend this online class.....take it in person if you can. I got an A, but it was hard.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I don\'t recommend this class (online). The prof doesn\'t lecture. No streams, no nothing. So you are learning on ur own. Not easy with stats. You do hw on one site and quizzes/exams on another. Frustrating, because the questions are so different btwn the sites. Take a different section, the current format just doesn\'t work.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Literally the worst teacher I have ever had.. Listen to everyone else when they say STAY AWAY! Even if that is the only section available (there is a reason for it) dont enroll in this class! ive spent everyday this whole semester doing stats and probablly going to get at the highest a C+.. HORRIBLE CLASS/TEACHER!
